title: How to get back in contact with a Google Support Specialist?
content:
Dear Sir,

I am from India and I was having an issue with my Pixel XL 2016. I escalated the case the same was assigned to a customer support specialist, namely Arin, with whom I have been in contact since 31st March and till 22nd April. But suddenly after 22nd April, the contact was lost and my emails don't reach the said customer support rep. anymore. Instead the Indian support reps. reply to my emails. I just want to know how can I get back in contact with the assigned support specialist namely Arin.

Kindly help me out here. I am attaching herewith the first email Arin sent to me on 31st March and the last one on 22nd April for your convenience.


Regards,
Saurav Ghosh
